name: Revisiting Caddy with Matt Holt & Mohammed S. Al Sahaf (Go Time #230)
summary: Matt Holt &amp; Mohammed S. Al Sahaf sit down with Natalie &amp; Jon to discuss every gopher’s favorite open source web server with automatic HTTPS! In addition to laying out what Caddy is and why it’s interesting, we dive deep into how you can (and why you might want to) extend Caddy as a result of its modular archite...
